channel.title: Thoughts on Made by Nathan
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Made by Nathan

item.title: 10 Reasons why Hackers should Jailbreak their iPhones
item.description: There was a post on the front page of Hacker News recently, titled “Making Chrome better on iOS”. Google’s Chrome browser is now available on iOS, and the author of the article was talking about how app developers could be persuaded to add some code to their apps which would allow Chrome to open links. Restrictions like this (not being able to change your default browser) are one of the many reasons why I wouldn’t buy another iPhone if it couldn’t be jailbroken.

item.title: Wikipedia is great, help keep it free!
